mapper.select: select * from cms_return where del_flag=0 and user_id=#{user_id} order by create_date desc
select count(d.id) from cms_return_detail d,cms_return r where r.user_id=#{user_id} and r.id=d.return_id and r.del_flag=0

select g.* from cms_goods g where not exists (select d.goods_id from cms_return_detail d,cms_return r where g.id=d.goods_id and r.user_id=#{querys.user_id} and r.id=d.return_id and r.del_flag=0 )
and g.code like '%${querys.goods_code}%'
and g.name like '%${querys.goods_name}%'
order by g.id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
